## Description
## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance optimization

## How Has This Been Tested?
- [ ] **Manual SSH Test:** Verified connection against the Docker LAMP stack.
- [ ] **WP-CLI Test:** Confirmed commands execute correctly on the remote target.
- [ ] **Python 3.14 Compatibility:** Verified the script runs without errors on the alpha interpreter.
- [ ] **Logs Check:** Confirmed generated files are saved correctly to the `logs/` directory.

## Checklist:
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project (ran `ruff check`).
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas.
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation.
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings.
- [ ] I have added the AGPLv3 header to any new files.
